articles.author: Story by Reuters
articles.title: Menstrual cramps derail Chinese teen's French Open dream in loss to Swiatek - CNN
articles.description: Chinese teenager Zheng Qinwen suffered with menstrual cramps as she lost to Poland's Iga Swiatek in the French Open fourth round on Monday after taking a set off the world's number one tennis player.
